It is nearly unfathomable that a child dies from this disease every 9 minutes...because it is a terrible death, not a quick one, AND IT IS 100% PREVENTABLE. Take a minute to share this info with your network, and check out Mission Rabies to see how you can help #eraserabies by 2030. #vetmed #vetmedicine #zoonosis #rabies #petcare #petcareservices #petcaretips #infectiousdiseases #prevention

The CIS Johneâ€™s Monitoring Services provides testing of your cattle to help manage the potential disease affecting your current and future herd. Johne's is an infectious, chronic, progressive wasting disease that in cattle leads to profuse and persistent scour, with severe weight loss. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/e-wzknuu

ğŸ…This week, EIDS is back with another crucial biosecurity tip for you. Here is Tip Number 6: âœ¨ Isolate Sick Horses âœ¨ ğŸ”¹Immediately isolate any horse showing signs of illness to prevent the spread of disease to other horses. ğŸ”¹Even without stables, you can create a dedicated field space with double fencing away from other paddocks and horses. ğŸ”¹Ensure these isolation areas are well signed and taped off to prevent people from accidentally entering them. #EquineHealth #EquineVet #EquineInfectiousDiseaseSurveillance

These include Lyme Disease, Babesia, Erlichia, Bartonella and many other diseases that can make both people and animals sick. ğŸ‘‰Although you may be careful when you hike or are out in â€œtick countryâ€, your dog, cat, horse or other animals that you are affectionate with may bring ticks into your home, where they may transfer from your animal to you. ğŸ‘‰If you get bit by the tick, you are at risk of developing a painful, chronic illness. ğŸ‘‰Continue reading, to learn more! https://lnkd.in/eMuqiPNp #tick #lymedisease #dogtick #pethealth
